param.name: disable-notify
param.descr: Takes an argument. Arguments are ALL, WARN, NOTICE, INFO, FATAL, DEBUG. If you want multiple disables then just do multiple --disable-notify on the command line. All argument are case insensitive. Default is all are enabled

param.name: dno
param.descr: A generic dump if one is available. This option ignores overviews

param.name: factories
param.descr: Prints factory list. If keyword_list_flag is true, the result of a saveState will be output for each object

param.name: ft2mtrs
param.descr: Gives meters from feet (0.3048006096 meters per foot)

param.name: ft2mtrs-us-survey
param.descr: Gives meters from feet (0.3048 meters per foot)

param.name: height
param.descr: Returns the MSL and ellipoid height given a latitude longitude position

param.name: mtrs2ft
param.descr: Gives feet from meters (0.3048 meters per foot)

param.name: mtrs2ft-us-survey
param.descr: Gives feet from meters (0.3048006096 meters per foot)

param.name: mtrsPerDeg
param.descr: Gives meters per degree and meters per minute for a given latitude

param.name: ossim-logfile
param.descr: takes a logfile as an argument. All output messages are redirected to the specified log file. By default there is no log file and all messages are enabled
